# vDSP_nzcrosD

**Function**

Counts and finds the zero crossings in a double-precision vector.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_nzcrosD(const double * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, vDSP_Length __B, vDSP_Length * __C, vDSP_Length * __D, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_nzcros], except for the type of the input vector.

## Single-Vector Zero Crossing Search

- **vDSP_nzcros**: Counts and finds the zero crossings in a single-precision vector.
